question: A lot of people have become dependent on technology as it plays a big role in our daily lives. Do you agree that living in computer age has more advantages than disadvantages?
text: This is undoubtedly true that technology occupied a big share of our day-to-day routine. I completely agree with this notion which will be explained in the following paragraphs.

It seems next to impossible to see this planet without any gadgets. Firstly, communication is a necessary part of our lives, So, the telephone is the best gift to the world. For instance,  Globalization has separated our dear ones but a phone call is enough to connect everyone. Moving further, our basic household chores  rely on machines, it also saves a lot of time, eg: Washing machine, Dishwasher, Vaccum and many more.

In comparing the current era to the medieval period ,It can be clearly seen that human has come across so far in terms of the facility. Machinery made  livelihood easy . Life is unpredictable but weather can be predictable, and important ventures can be planned accordingly.
